resources.string: 설정을 적용하기 위해 센스를 다시 시작하겠습니까?

Changes the transparency of your statusbar
Change number of columns in app drawer
Will add a transparency to app drawer
Allows you to hide the arrows from the keyboard
Enable to be able to close the app drawer with the back key
Hides the share button when you tap on a feed
Make the sense navbar transparent on homescreen
Make the sense folders transparent on homescreen
Make the sense navbar transparent in the app drawer
Enables using custom colors or backgrounds for the app drawer
Enable to use custom backgrounds for the blinkfeed
Choose a custom background for blinkfeed
Enable to use custom backgrounds for the blinkfeed
The color for the blinkfeed tiles
Choose a custom background for the tiles
"Enable haptic feedback for your capactive buttons, while it's globally disabled"

화면이 꺼졌을때, 길게 눌러서 할 작업을 정합니다
시계,설정 등 아이콘이 있는 곳 밑에 정보를 보여줍니다

Customize long press Recent apps action
Take a picture by pressing the home button in the camera app
Use the volume up key to toggle flashlight when screen is OFF.

Choose an action for longpressing the back button on the lockscreen
Choose an action for pressing the home button on the lockscreen

Choose an action for pressing the back button on the lockscreen

Allows you to slide your finger from back to recent apps to unlock the phone
네트워크를 통한 빠른 휴면을 사용합니다. 모든 통신사를 지원하지는 않으니 주의하세요!
세손가락 제스쳐로 할 수 있는 작업을 선택합니다
Choose size of quick settings and quick launch icons

Change the status bar background color
Change the overlay color of the native eqs toggles
Change the color of the indicator when the option is enabled
Change the color of the indicator when the option is disabled

Set the overlay color of the icons when enabled
Set the overlay color of the icons when disabled
Change the vertical EQS background color
Change the color of the title in vertical EQS
Change the color of the description in vertical EQS
Change the color of the dividers in vertical EQS
Use power+home to take a screenshot. If you use sweep2wake its suggested to turn that feature off
Enable to use the overlay color - WARNING: works best with single color icons
Set the overlay color of the icons when enabled
Set the overlay color of the icons when disabled
Change the horizontal EQS background color
Change the color of the title in horizontal EQS
Change the color of the indicator when the option is enabled
Change the color of the indicator when the option is disabled
Change the clock color of the expanded status bar
Change the color of the information string below the header
Hides settings button from right corner of notification area
Run custom app when you press on settings button
Run custom app when you press on header
Sets the brightness strength of the autobacklight
Enable to let the LED flash when a notification comes in also while charging
Set the flash duration of the LED when you have a notification
Set the flash duration in minutes
Press volume up in Camera to start/stop recording or volume down to take photo
Might increase performance and battery life, but no logging
Allows you to fix UID/GID mismatches
Perform zipalign on all user apps
Are you sure, that you want wipe cache partition?
Are you sure that you want to wipe dalvik-cache? Phone will be automatically quick rebooted on complete!
Use an alternative shortcut when touching the clock on the weatherclock widget
Use an alternative shortcut when touching the weather on the weatherclock widget
Disables the small the 3 dot button on the top right of some apps
Hides labels from shortcuts on lockscreen
Prevent WiFi from disabling at night
Allows you to enable Sweep2Wake if the feature is supported by your kernel
Set up the Android low memory killer settings
Displays data icon even when connected to WiFi
Shows higher signal strength than stock
Sets the home longpress delay on lockscreen
Sets the back longpress delay on lockscreen
Disables crt animation on screen off
Choose your desired homescreen grid layout
화면이 꺼졌을때 볼륨키를 비활성화합니다, 단 음악이 재생중일때는 활성화합니다
길게 누를때 실행되는 일이 일어나기까지의 시간을 설정합니다
볼륨 다운버튼을 누르면 화면이 꺼지게 합니다
잠금화면에서 상태바를 내릴 수 없게 합니다
볼륨 버튼을 눌러서 볼륨크기를 설정해도 소리가 나지 않습니다
CPU와 파일 시스템 설정을 기기가 켜질때 자동으로 적용합니다. 무한 부팅이 될 수도 있습니다.
I confirm the above conditions. Do not show the dialog again.
We, Team Venom, are not responsible if your device takes any damage from undervolting or overclocking. You are using those settings on your own risk!
Overclocking your device, especially in combination with undervolting may cause damage to your device. You are using those features on your own risk.
빠른 설정 탭에서 애플리케이션 바로가기를 사용합니다
메시지앱에서 전송버튼 아래에 이모티콘 패널을 사용합니다
메뉴키에서 검색키로 슬라이드할 때 작업을 실행합니다
뒤로 가기에서 홈키로 슬라이드할 때 작업을 실행합니다
당신은 1€를 베놈팀에 기부함으로써 롬 개발자들을 도울 수 있습니다. 기부를 누른후 베놈트윅 PRO를 사기만 하면 됩니다. 그럼 이 메시지는 더이상 나오지 않습니다.
WiFi N 지원을 활성화합니다, 몇몇 나라에서만 지원합니다.
WiFi N support automatically unlocked! You can disable WiFi N support in Venom Tweaks!
HDMI out을 켜면 몇몇 동영상 앱에서 렉이 걸릴수 있습니다(예. 카메라나 유튜브)
당신의 앱이 잠금화면에서 알림을 띄울 수 있습니다
When you connect device to PC, install CD for HTC Sync will be mounted
Change what will be shown on longpress on header
Allows you to select when NFC must work
Hide or select city for weather in notification area
Shows menu key in bottom or in top bar
Force Sense to rescan all widgets, if some of them are missing
Easily create bug report for developers

Creating bug report:

  • Press Start recording button
  • Perform actions to make error
  • If you want to attach screenshots to the report, longpress home button to take screenshot, and it will be attached
  • Press on the notification in notification area to stop recording
  • Open Venom/BugReports folder on your sdcard with any file explorer, and send to us generated zip file
Select which rotations are allowed when autorotation is enabled
Use the power button to turn the flashlight on
Change size of clock on lockscreen
Enables support for orientation on Contacts, Dialer and InCall screen
Set transparency and color of keyboard background
Set font color for main buttons
Set font color for alternative buttons
Use hardware camera key as search key
Action when you press volume buttons with opened notification area
Action when you shake your phone left or right with opened notification area
Disables the native quicksettings and replaces the right top button with the known settings button.
Allows you select animation type while switching tabs in HTC apps
앱에서 IMEI를 리포트할때 가짜 IMEI를 전송할 앱을 선택합니다
랜덤 IMEI를 사용하고 싶다면 just left this input field empty
The higher the value the more precisely you can set your volume
Set your volume steps manually for each volume mode individually
Use light colored controls in the vertical EQS when using a light background.
"Tries to fix the proximity issues on calls. Enable if you got issues. If it's getting worse when enabled, disable it."
Enable to display traffic speeds in your statusbar
Hides the clock weather item on the lockscreen
Hides the clock weather item in the appdrawer
Hides the widget page hints on the lockscreen
기기의 하단을 두번 두드려 기기를 깨웁니다
Logo2Wake allows you to sleep or wake the device by long pressing the HTC logo. You have to press just slightly above the HTC logo. The screen will automatically turn on or off with a long press.
Pocket detection protects against accidental wakes while S2W, DT2W or L2W are enabled and the phone is in your pocket.
Enabling Logo2Menu allows you to use the HTC logo as a menu button. You must press just slightly above the HTC logo
With Button Light Notification, the capacitive buttons will blink on and off when you have a new notification
This allows to force AC charging for any charger that is detected as USB
Set the vibration strength for the button/sweep2wake actions
Quiet hours will mute all notifications and haptic feedback. It will NOT mute your calls.
"Configure when the quiet hours shall start. "
"Configure when the quiet hours shall end. "
No sounds will be played except for incoming calls
Specify the apps allowed to notify you during quiet hours
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
"VenomPie is based on LMT. LMT has more features, like gesture, command support and more! HUGE thanks to noname81, who made LMT compatible for us. Click here, to visit his thread"
"Starts the pie touchservice - If the pie doesn't work anymore, come here and restart the service."
Configure on which sides the pie shall be activated
Configure the gravity of the activation bar
Pie outline size (Just for custom colors)
"Set the icon behavior of mapped apps 0=disabled, 1=enabled(no filter), 2=enabled, >2=size in pixel"
"Set the icon behavior of mapped user images 0=disabled, 1=enabled(no filter), 2=enabled, >2=size in pixel"
Set the behavior of the status info
Set the font of the status info
Configure the colors of your pie

Applies the kernel settings on boot. Overides other kernel settings you may made.
"Click here to start a step by step tutorial how to use pie. Credits and thanks to Basil3 for the tutorial."
"We've updated the pro keys in the playstore. It's required to update them to be able to continue using VenomTweaks."
"Enable if your desired icon pack doesn't appear in the list. Scanning icon packs will take long!. It's recommended to turn compatibilty off."
Places a desired background as underlay to your stock icons.
